verses.verse: And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to burn <S%H4729><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> upon <S%H7848><s%>: of acacia wood <S%H6086><s%> shall you make it <S%H6213><s%>.

A cubit <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> there and a cubit <S%H520><s%> the breadth <S%H7341><s%> there foursquare <S%H7251><s%> shall it be <S%H520><s%>: and two cubits shall be the height <S%H6967><s%> there the horns there shall be of the same <S%H7161><s%>.

And you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> it with pure <S%H2889><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, the top <S%H1406><s%> there and the sides <S%H7023><s%> there round about <S%H5439><s%>, and the horns <S%H7161><s%> there and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> unto it a crown <S%H2213><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> to it under the crown <S%H2213><s%> of it <S%H8147><s%>, by the two corners <S%H6763><s%> there upon the two <S%H8147><s%> sides <S%H6654><s%> of it shall you make <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H1004><s%>; and they shall be for places for the poles <S%H905><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> it withal <S%H1992><s%>.
And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> that is by the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> that is over the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, where I will meet with you <S%H3259><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> on it sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> every morning <S%H1242><s%>: when he dresses <S%H3190><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%>, he shall burn incense upon it <S%H6999><s%>.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> lights <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%>, he shall burn incense <S%H6999><s%> upon it <S%H8548><s%>, a perpetual incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

You shall offer <S%H5927><s%> no strange <S%H2114><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> on it nor burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>, nor food offering <S%H4503><s%>; neither shall you pour <S%H5258><s%> drink offering on it <S%H5262><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> upon the horns <S%H7161><s%> of it once <S%H259><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> of atonements <S%H3725><s%>: once <S%H259><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> shall he make atonement <S%H3722><s%> upon it throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

When you take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> after their number <S%H6485><s%>, then shall they give <S%H5414><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%> for his soul <S%H5315><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, when you numberest <S%H6485><s%> them <S%H5063><s%>; that there be no plague among them <S%H6485><s%>, when you numberest them.

This they shall give <S%H5414><s%>, every one that passes <S%H5674><s%> among <S%H5921><s%> them that are numbered <S%H6485><s%>, half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>: (a shekel <S%H8255><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>:) an half <S%H4276><s%> shekel <S%H8255><s%> shall be the offering <S%H8641><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Every one that passes <S%H5674><s%> among them that are numbered <S%H6485><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and above <S%H4605><s%>, shall give <S%H5414><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

The rich <S%H6223><s%> shall not give more <S%H7235><s%>, and the poor <S%H1800><s%> shall not give less <S%H4591><s%> than half <S%H4276><s%> a shekel <S%H8255><s%>, when they give <S%H5414><s%> an offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls <S%H5315><s%>.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the atonement <S%H3725><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and shall appoint <S%H5414><s%> it for the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>; that it may be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for your souls <S%H5315><s%>.
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

You shall also make <S%H6213><s%> a basin <S%H3595><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%>, and his foot <S%H3653><s%> also of brass <S%H5178><s%>, to wash <S%H7364><s%> with <S%H5414><s%>: and you shall put it between the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and you shall put <S%H5414><s%> water in it <S%H4325><s%>
For Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall wash <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet there <S%H7272><s%>.

When they go <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>, that they die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H5066><s%>; or when they come near to the altar <S%H4196><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%>, to burn offering <S%H6999><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

So they shall wash <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet <S%H7272><s%>, that they die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H2706><s%>: and it shall be a statute for ever <S%H5769><s%> to them <S%H2233><s%>, even to him and to his seed throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Moreover the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> you also unto you principal <S%H7218><s%> spices <S%H1314><s%>, of pure <S%H1865><s%> myrrh <S%H4753><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H1314><s%>, and of sweet cinnamon <S%H7076><s%> half <S%H4276><s%> so much <S%H4276><s%>, even two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels <S%H1314><s%>, and of sweet cane <S%H7070><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty shekels <S%H2572><s%>,

And of cassia <S%H6916><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> a hin <S%H1969><s%>:

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it an oil <S%H8081><s%> of holy <S%H6944><s%> ointment <S%H4888><s%>, an ointment <S%H7545><s%> compound <S%H4842><s%> after the art <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary <S%H7543><s%>: it shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>.
And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> therewith <S%H727><s%>, and the ark of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>,
And the table <S%H7979><s%> and all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> and his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%>,
And the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> with all his vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and the basin <S%H3595><s%> and his foot <S%H3653><s%>.
And you shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H6944><s%>, that they may be most holy <S%H6944><s%>: whatever touches <S%H5060><s%> them shall be holy <S%H6942><s%>.
And you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and consecrate <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H3547><s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, This shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> unto me throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Upon man <S%H120><s%>'s flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall it not be poured <S%H3251><s%>, neither shall you make <S%H6213><s%> any other like it <S%H4971><s%>, after the composition of it <S%H6944><s%>: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto you <S%H6944><s%>.
Whoever <S%H834><s%> compounds <S%H7543><s%> any like it <S%H5414><s%>, or whoever puts any of it upon a stranger <S%H2114><s%>, shall even be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> unto you sweet spices <S%H5561><s%>, stacte <S%H5198><s%>, and onycha <S%H7827><s%>, and galbanum <S%H2464><s%>; these sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H5561><s%> with pure <S%H2134><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%>: of each <S%H905><s%> shall there be a like weight <S%H905><s%>:

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> it a perfume <S%H7004><s%>, a confection <S%H7545><s%> after the are <S%H4639><s%> of the apothecary <S%H7543><s%>, tempered <S%H4414><s%> together <S%H2889><s%>, pure and holy <S%H6944><s%>:

And you shall beat <S%H7833><s%> some of it very small <S%H1854><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> of it before <S%H6440><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, where I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with you it shall be unto you most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

And as for the perfume <S%H7004><s%> which you shall make <S%H6213><s%>, you shall not make <S%H6213><s%> to yourselves according to the composition <S%H4971><s%> there it shall be unto you holy <S%H6944><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Whoever <S%H834><s%> shall make <S%H6213><s%> like unto that <S%H7306><s%>, to smell like it <S%H3772><s%>, shall even be cut off from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
